steps.title: Draw a medium circle near the topmost area of the paper.
steps.content: Draw a medium circle near the topmost area of the paper.

steps.title: Draw a stretched egg-shaped oval (vertical orientation) and intersect it with the circle.
steps.content: Draw a stretched egg-shaped oval (vertical orientation) and intersect it with the circle.

steps.title: Draw a pair of little egg-shaped ovals at the base of the bigger oval.
steps.content: Draw a pair of little egg-shaped ovals at the base of the bigger oval. Intersect each at both sides of the bigger oval.

steps.title: Draw the outline for Toothless' front legs and wings.
steps.content: Draw the outline for Toothless' front legs and wings.

steps.title: Draw facial guide lines (a vertical line with two horizontal lines across it, forming a kind of two-beamed cross).
steps.content: Draw facial guide lines (a vertical line with two horizontal lines across it, forming a kind of two-beamed cross). This will help in placing Toothless' eyes.

steps.title: Using the facial line guides, start drawing Toothless' eyes and nose (in this orientation, he is looking down).
steps.content: Using the facial line guides, start drawing Toothless' eyes and nose (in this orientation, he is looking down).

steps.title: Draw Toothless' big ears and little horns on top of his head.
steps.content: Draw Toothless' big ears and little horns on top of his head. Place dashed lines in between his forehead going towards the back of his head, to make a lizard's scale impression.

steps.title: Trace Toothless' front legs with claws at the bottom.
steps.content: Trace Toothless' front legs with claws at the bottom.

steps.title: Draw Toothless' hind legs with claws.
steps.content: Draw Toothless' hind legs with claws.

steps.title: Trace Toothless' folded wings that resembled that of a bat.
steps.content: Trace Toothless' folded wings that resembled that of a bat.

steps.title: Remove unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Remove unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color the drawing as desired.
steps.content: Color the drawing as desired. Note: Toothless' entire body is dark grey.

steps.title: Near the bottom and leftmost side of the paper, draw a large horizontal oval for his head.
steps.content: Near the bottom and leftmost side of the paper, draw a large horizontal oval for his head.

steps.title: Draw a larger diagonal oval (southwest to northeast orientation) and intersect it with the first oval.
steps.content: Draw a larger diagonal oval (southwest to northeast orientation) and intersect it with the first oval.

steps.title: In between the head and attached to the bigger oval, draw pine-nut shaped ovals for his legs.
steps.content: In between the head and attached to the bigger oval, draw pine-nut shaped ovals for his legs.

steps.title: Draw an oblong as one of its hind legs.
steps.content: Draw an oblong as one of its hind legs. Draw guide lines for Toothless' wings.

steps.title: Protruding behind Toothless, draw his tail.
steps.content: Protruding behind Toothless, draw his tail. On its tip, trace shapes that would make it look like a fishtail.

steps.title: On the head part, draw facial guide lines (a vertical line with two horizontal lines across it, forming a kind of two-beamed cross).
steps.content: On the head part, draw facial guide lines (a vertical line with two horizontal lines across it, forming a kind of two-beamed cross). This will help in placing Toothless' eyes.

steps.title: Start tracing Toothless' head outline, along with his scaly forehead, long ears and horns.
steps.content: Start tracing Toothless' head outline, along with his scaly forehead, long ears and horns. Begin tracing his front legs too. Don't forget the claws.

steps.title: Using the facial guide lines, draw Toothless' large cartoon eyes and little nose holes.
steps.content: Using the facial guide lines, draw Toothless' large cartoon eyes and little nose holes. At the southwest corner of the head, draw a little smile.

steps.title: Continue tracing the rest of Toothless' legs.
steps.content: Continue tracing the rest of Toothless' legs.

steps.title: Start tracing the rest of Toothless' body, wings and the details of his tail.
steps.content: Start tracing the rest of Toothless' body, wings and the details of his tail.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color the drawing as desired.
steps.content: Color the drawing as desired. Note: Toothless' entire body is dark grey.
